body.name: LODFHLL 3-Tier Small Shoe Rack，Metal Lightweight Shoes Shelf Multifunctional Organizer Stackable Stand Footwear Display Shelf，for Closet Hallway Entryway Living Room Bedroom (3-Tier Black Shoe Rack)
features: Shoe organizer size about 42*19*43cm/16.54*7.48*16.93inch, can put about 6 pairs shoes, suitable to place in entryway, hallway, wardrobe, closet, dormitory, terrace, cabinet, garage, garden and more.

No special tools required for shoe rack installation, to attach the shelf tubes to the both side frames, snap tightly, and then snap each tier together. The shoe rack is easy to clean and maintain, can use damp cloth to dash.

Multifunctional shoes rack storage, not only can place shoes, but also put kitchen utensils, as a closet wardrobe storage rack, to organize and display crafts, laundry, toys, plants, books, accessories, etc.
Storage rack is made of alloy steel tubes and plastic materials connectors, lightweight, can be easily disassembled into parts, easy moving and storage.

X Shape Frames design to make the rack sturdy and stable, three tubes of a tier place to let you shoes not drop, organizing your dress shoes, ballet shoes, sneakers, running shoes, hiking boots, canvas shoes, sandals and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-functional storage The shoe rack has 3 levels, the bottom two levels can hold shoes and the top level can hold other items such as handbags, books, plants and other small items you need. This way, you can easily find your items and shoes. Simple and stylish design The design is simple and stylish and versatile, and it is more suitable to be placed anywhere in your house. Make your storage more convenient. And does not take up space, so that your room use more area. Sturdy and durable, easy to clean The shoe rack is made of PP material on the side and stitched together with rust-proof thickened steel pipe in the middle. You can easily clean the surface without dead ends.

Size show Length: 42cm/16.53in Width: 19cm/7.48in Height: 43cm/16.93in Shoe rack not only has a good storage function, but also very space-saving. It can be placed on the balcony, corridor side, next to the door, the hallway, without affecting the use of your room space. Make your room more neat and tidy show well organized.
Thickened steel pipe The selected thickened steel pipe is stronger and more durable, withstand more weight, and have to do anti-rust treatment, more durable, not easy to corrosion.

Installation instructions. 1: the product is relatively lightweight, easy to install, follow the instructions to install. 2: Do not use too much force during installation to prevent damage to the parts. 3: installation attention to prevent injury, you can wear gloves to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just As Advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Came quickly, easy to assemble. Reasonable sturdiness. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WHAT A SCAM
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Such a scam. The size of it is RIDICULOUSLY SMALL. I COULDN’T EVEN FIT TEO PAIRS OF SLIPPERS SIDE BY SIDE. What a scam and waste of money. Actually upset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a smaller show rack for out front room to keep our shoes organized. I knew purchasing this item, it was a smaller show rack, however, it is too small for my husband's shoes to fit, he wears a 10.5 shoe. I can keep my shoes and my 9 y/o shoes on this shoe rack but that's it and my husband's shoes sit on the side. If you are wanting this for small shoes, it's a good item but the metal rods are not very sturdy and came to me slightly bent already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the Sturdiest, but Great Price and Size for a Small Space
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this product does exactly what we needed. We have a small entry space by the kitchen so we needed a solution for storing our shoes. This product did exactly that. Assembly was super quick and easy. (Be careful when putting the metal tubes in. We pushed too hard on one and cracked part of the plastic on one side). In terms of sturdiness, it works for the types of shoes we are putting on it. We have women's shoes on it like tennis shoes, flats and flip flops and it holds just fine. For the price, it is a good enough product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small just like expected
reviews.reviewText: This fit perfectly for the small space behind my door. It's not anything extra does its purpose & worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's the right size for the space I have but it's not at all sturdy. I wouldn't recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Built for Use Rather than Ostination
reviews.reviewText: I had a tiny space and wanted a shoe rack to hold my "every day" shoes that I wear most frequently. I wanted to grab and go, and I also wanted to put them up quickly. As you can see it holds two pairs of my shoes on each shelf. Yes, it's plastic on the sides, and not really very beautiful. But in my case, I didn't care, I just wanted something small and convenient! This old lady had no trouble assembling it - although I had to borrow my husband's soft mallet to tap things into place and make it sturdy as suggested in the instructions. I don't think it even took me 10 minutes to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Satisfied - Rack is smaller than pictured
reviews.reviewText: The picture advertised is not sufficient. The rack is very Small and anyone with a shoe size over mens size 7, the rack would be pointless. It comes with 9 steel rods and 2 pieces of plastic. The assembly is easy but had I known that it would be big enough for one size 10 shoe going horizontal on each row, I would not have purchased it.
Se ve más bonito en las fotos. El producto real es de plástico barato. Sin embargo funciona bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: No está mal perso es muy ligero.
reviews.reviewText: Es pequeño, justo lo que buscaba, pero no esperen un material fuerte.
Lo acabo de recibir y ya viene roto y un tubo está chueco de la punta

La estructura funciona bien como zapatero para calzado no muy alto o grande (hasta talla 8.5) y es fácil de armar.Los tubos no son de metal. Es plástico pintado de plateado. Me parece caro para los materiales con los que está hecho.
